description: I. Premature adult social care complaints: frequently asked questions. LGO Advice Team. July 2009. 2 p. II. Complaints, compliments, comments and suggestions in adult social care. 4 p. III. Letter dated 12/03/2010 from Baroness Thornton to Baroness Masham regarding the Personal Care at Home Bill and appeals procedure relating to free personal care. 2 p.
